alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Lake Of The Woods; Roseau; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 10:15AM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Kittson, Roseau, Lake Of The Woods, West Marshall and East Marshall Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery travel conditions. Heavy snowfall rates and blowing snow may reduce visibilities to a quarter mile or less during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Lake Of The Woods; Roseau; West Marshall
